ComicInfo.Summary:
A man and his wife are sightseeing through the famous Paris sewers, when they come upon an underground society of cannibalistic mutants.
A doctor hypnotizes a man so he can delve into his previous life. It turns out long ago in the 19th century he was a werewolf who was killed by angry villagers. Through hypnosis he becomes a werewolf again in the modern day.
In the 12th century, the people in Europe have gone mad with fear due to an incoming "Doom Star". It turns out it was a spacecraft that contained humanoid animals who warn a knight that humanity must not continue on its self destructive path or else!
Rampant pollution has killed most of the sea life and has caused others to become gigantic monsters who attack civilization. Most of the monsters are defeated by radiation, but the radiation has gotten into the drinking water and is causing mutant babies to be born.
During World War 2, Nazis are being killed by vampires from Romania.
During the Spanish Inquisition a nobleman kills a judge, but the judge returns from the grave to get revenge.
